column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This is theeeee spot to go my Yelp friends! Yes
column4: so do be wary of a lil wait time. But it is worth it
column5: I promise you! There are both bottom and top floor seating options. They prompt you to order the pizza you want up front since it takes 40 minutes to cook
column6: then you wait to be seated!
